paper.title: A Hopfield Network for the Portfolio Selection Problem
paper.abstract: Given a set of available assets the portfolio selection problem consists in finding out the best way of investing a particular amount of money in the assets Some heuristic methods based on evolutionary algorithms tabu search and simulated annealing have been developed in the past Here we present a Hopfield neural network model to solve the portfolio selection problem comparing the new results to those obtained with the other heuristic methods

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用Hopfield神经网络来解决投资组合选择问题，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文明确提到其研究目标是找到投资于一组资产的最佳方式，并与其他启发式方法进行了比较。
